10#ifndef RTC_BASE_MEMORY_USAGE_H_
11#define RTC_BASE_MEMORY_USAGE_H_
12
13#include <stdint.h>
14
15namespace rtc {
16
17// Returns current memory used by the process in bytes (working set size on
18// Windows and resident set size on other platforms).
19// Returns -1 on failure.
20int64_t GetProcessResidentSizeBytes();
21
22} // namespace rtc
23
24#endif // RTC_BASE_MEMORY_USAGE_H_
